title.cs: Pokročilé reasoning techniky a Red Teaming

description.en: Learn Chain-of-Thought techniques and master defense-in-depth strategies against prompt injection.
description.cs: Naučte se Chain-of-Thought techniky a ovládněte strategie hloubkové obrany proti prompt injection.

learning_outcomes: Use Chain-of-Thought to make AI reason step by step
Apply 5 defense-in-depth techniques (Sandwich, Spotlighting, Parametric, Refusal, Filtering)
Execute red teaming exercises to find vulnerabilities
Understand 5 common attack vectors and their defenses
Use tools like PyRIT and Garak for automated security testing
